forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, one can expect a brief embrace of warmth amidst the typical coolness of the sea breeze. The skies, mostly sunny with a venerable brightness, invite you to linger outdoors, though the crisp air teeters gently on the edge of chill. Expect temperatures to taper off toward the mid-50s, drawing a subtle reminder of the ocean's influence, while the west-southwest wind whispers through the city at a mild pace. 

This evening will usher in a curtain of clouds, as the sun gives way to a blanket of gray. With temperatures descending to the cozy mid-40s, a light jacket or sweater will become your trusted companion. The marine layer, faint and elusive, clings near the edges but won’t impose; you may witness the playful dance of low clouds flirting with the hills, merely accentuating the city's dramatic silhouette. For those contemplating the hours ahead, consider a leisurely stroll through the Mission, with its vibrant murals catching the softening light, or perhaps settle into one of the quieter cafes that invite lingering over a warm cup, as the evening takes on its cool, contemplative air.
